title: Chicken and pasta soup
ingredients: ['2 cubes chicken stock', '350g fusilli pasta', '3.1 litres chicken stock', '1 litre water', '6 sticks celery, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '4 carrots, chopped', '675g chicken, cut into bite size pieces', 'garlic granules to taste', '1 teaspoon onion powder', 'salt and pepper to taste']
